startGame

mainMenu.js
¶ 
1  /*globals module, require, localStorage*/
2  
3  var Phaser = require('phaser');
4  
5  module.exports = MainMenu;
6  
7  function MainMenu(game) {
8    console.info("Starting Main Menu", game);
9  }
10  
11  MainMenu.prototype.create = function () {
12    var game = this.game;
13    var tween, highscore = localStorage.getItem("highscore"),
14      lastscore = localStorage.getItem("lastscore"),
15      style = {
16        font: '30px Arial',
17        fill: '#fff'
18      };
19  
20    if (highscore) {
21      this.highscore = highscore;
22    } else {
23      this.highscore = 0;
24    }
25  
26    this.background = this.add.sprite(0, 0, 'menu_background');
27    this.background.alpha = 0;
28    this.background.width = game.width;
29    this.background.height = game.height;
30    
31    this.labelTitle = game.add.text(20, 20, "Tap to start", style);
32    this.labelTitle.alpha = 0;
33  
34    this.highscoreLabel = game.add.text(20, 280, "High Score: " + this.highscore, style);
35  
36    if (lastscore) {
37      this.lastscoreLabel = game.add.text(20, 240, "Last Score: " + lastscore, style);
38    }
39  
40    tween = this.add.tween(this.background).to({
41      alpha: 1
42    }, 500, Phaser.Easing.Linear.None, true);
43    this.add.tween(this.labelTitle).to({
44      alpha: 1
45    }, 500, Phaser.Easing.Linear.None, true);
46  
47    tween.onComplete.add(this.addPointerEvents, this);
48  };
49  
50  
51  
52  MainMenu.prototype.addPointerEvents = function () {
53    this.input.onDown.addOnce(this.startGame, this);
54  };
55  
56  
57

¶ startGame

Starts up the game!

Returns
Phaser.Game returns a new instance of Phaser.Game 
61  
62  MainMenu.prototype.startGame = function () {
63    this.game.state.start('level1', true, false);
64  };
